Name
Format
Size
Description
WIOA_ETPL - Manual
2.9 MB
Manual developed to aid representatives from schools and Local Workforce Investment Boards to utilize the Louisiana Occupational Information System on line application for program eligibility required under the Workforce Investment and Opportunity Act. Some items included in the manual are FAQs, Internet access instructions, examples of Web displays and technical tips.

1.5 MB
WIOA_ETPL - Reapplication Steps
887 KB

WIOA Combined State Plan/Regional Plans

Name
Format
Size
Description
Combined State Plan - July 1, 2024 through June 30, 2027
6.4 MB
This document outlines Louisiana's Demand-Driven Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Plan for Title I, Title II, Title III and Title IV of the Act. This plan also includes the following partner programs: Community Services Block Grant CSBG, Veterans State Grants JVSG, Temporary Assistance for Need Families TANF and Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program SNAP.
Local Workforce Development Area Regional/Local Plans
HTML
View Local Workforce Development Area Regional/Local Plans by RLMA.

WIOA Eligible Training Provider Manual
3.6 MB
Manual developed to aid representatives from schools and Local Workforce Investment Boards to utilize the Louisiana Occupational Information System on line application for program eligibility required under the Workforce Investment and Opportunity Act. Some items included in the manual are FAQs, Internet access instructions, examples of Web displays and technical tips.

445 KB
Form required from educational training providers that are applying for WIOA program eligibility, certifying that the student data provided for performance calculations is true and correct to the best of their knowledge
